H0.text: What are the narrow bands of strong winds called which move around the world between about six and twelve miles high. Wind Channels

H1.text: What are the narrow bands of strong winds called which move around the world between about six and twelve miles high. Aerial Currents

H2.text: What are the narrow bands of strong winds called which move around the world between about six and twelve miles high. Sky Rivers

H3.text: What are the narrow bands of strong winds called which move around the world between about six and twelve miles high. Jetstream

A4.text: Jet streams are fast flowing, narrow air currents in the Earth's atmosphere.

A5.text: The main jet streams are located near the altitude of the tropopause and are westerly winds, flowing west to east around the globe.
